    D

    displayLog() - Method in class AlertSystem
    Displays all sent messages for the session in descending order with most recent messages first.

    E

    N

    NotificationMedium - Interface in Unnamed Package
    Interface that allows for delivery of notification messages to terminal output through different platforms.
    notifyUser(String) - Method in class AlertSystem
    Sends a message to the terminal output through the current active notification platform.

    S

    send(String) - Method in class EmailService
    Sends a message as an email to terminal output.
    send(String) - Method in interface NotificationMedium
    Sends a notification message as requested medium to terminal output.
    send(String) - Method in class SMSService
    Sends a message as an SMS to terminal output.
    setMedium(NotificationMedium) - Method in class AlertSystem
    Changes the notification medium to chosen platform.
    SMSService - Class in Unnamed Package
